Rye Rye Bread Co.

The Restaurant

Rye Rye bread company is a local bakery that offers artisan sourdough. Our sourdough is naturally leavened and uses locally milled ancestor grains.

Catering

You have fun. We'll handle the baking. Rye Rye Bread Company can cater events from snacks for a meeting to elegant corporate fundraisers

Location and Hours

Long Beach, Ca; Open every day from 6am-11pm.
